Reviews.Title: Buen vendedor
Reviews.Author: Moicam.
Reviews.Content: El telefono es muy bueno. Solo le coloque mi chip de movistar y funcionó perfectamente. Es práctico y ligero. El equipo viene con manual en español. Muy buen vendedor.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: burchell
Reviews.Content: Thanks to Amazon for a very effecient delivery of the purchase before the estimated arrival date.The performance of the phone is very good. I love the dual sim functionality.My only minor disappointment with the product is that each contact number has to be saved under a new name.

Reviews.Title: motorola cell phone
Reviews.Author: clayten pelep
Reviews.Content: it is really good functioning normally. i buy one it is dual sim and camera. it is reall the fit size for everyone else
